projects.name: Corpus Christi
projects.content: While working at Sparkjoy Studio, I lead the development of the Corpus Christi project. The project uses a custom built Wordpress theme and leverages ACF for dynamic blocks. Additionally, during the development of this project I mentored a junior developer, giving guidance and assisting in any roadblocks they hit.

projects.name: Sid Saraiya
projects.content: I worked closely with Sid to refresh his website and take advantage of current trends. The website is built upon Wordpress using a custom built theme.

projects.name: Anxiety Canada
projects.content: Anxiety Canada was in need of a redesign and redevelopment of a slow and outdated website. As the lead front-end developer at Sparkjoy Studios, I lead the redevelopment of a custom Wordpress theme. Additionally, I development child themes for a LMS and Fundrasing sub sites of Anxiety Canada.

projects.name: Borders In Globalization
projects.content: As the lead front-end developer at Sparkjoy Studios, I developed a custom Wordpress theme based on designs provided by the design team. The project required a fast turn around and leaveraged ACF for custom blocks.
